tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_activity_trn_texts; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_activity_trn_texts AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id,
CASE aav.governmentapprovalprocedures WHEN true THEN 2 WHEN false THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS governmentapprovalprocedures_id, CASE aav.governmentapprovalprocedures WHEN true THEN 'Yes' WHEN false THEN 'No' ELSE 'Undefined' END AS governmentapprovalprocedures_text,
CASE aav.jointcriteria WHEN true THEN 2 WHEN false THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS jointcriteria_id, CASE aav.jointcriteria WHEN true THEN 'Yes' WHEN false THEN 'No' ELSE 'Undefined' END AS jointcriteria_text,
CASE WHEN (aav.indirect_on_budget) THEN 'Indirect On Budget' ELSE '' END AS iob_text, CASE WHEN (aav.indirect_on_budget) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS iob_id,
COALESCE(impl_level.level_code, 999999999) AS impl_level_id, COALESCE(impl_level.name, 'Undefined') AS impl_level_name,
COALESCE(on_off_budget.budget_id, 999999999) AS on_off_budget_id, COALESCE(on_off_budget.budget, 'Undefined') AS on_off_budget_name,
COALESCE(humanitarian_aid.val_id, 999999999) AS humanitarian_aid_id, COALESCE(humanitarian_aid.val, 'Undefined') AS humanitarian_aid_name,
COALESCE(ac_chapter.val_id, 999999999) AS ac_chapter_id, COALESCE(ac_chapter.name, 'Undefined') AS ac_chapter_name
FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN v_implementation_level impl_level ON impl_level.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id LEFT JOIN v_on_off_budget on_off_budget ON on_off_budget.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id LEFT JOIN v_humanitarian_aid humanitarian_aid ON humanitarian_aid.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id LEFT JOIN v_ac_chapters ac_chapter ON ac_chapter.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id
